name: Child Custody Agreement
description: Legal agreement outlining custody, visitation, and parental responsibilities for children

sections.title: CHILD CUSTODY AGREEMENT
sections.content:
This Child Custody Agreement (the "Agreement") is made and entered into on {effective_date} by and between:

{parent1_name}, residing at {parent1_address} ("Parent 1")

and

{parent2_name}, residing at {parent2_address} ("Parent 2")

(collectively referred to as "the Parents").

sections.title: 1. CHILDREN
2. LEGAL CUSTODY
sections.content:
Legal custody refers to the right and responsibility to make major decisions affecting the Children's welfare, including decisions regarding education, medical care, religious upbringing, and other important matters.

{legal_custody_arrangement}

sections.title: 3. PHYSICAL CUSTODY
sections.content:
Physical custody refers to where the Children will physically reside.

{physical_custody_arrangement}

sections.title: 4. REGULAR VISITATION SCHEDULE
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following regular visitation schedule:

{visitation_schedule}

sections.title: 5. HOLIDAY AND VACATION SCHEDULE
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following holiday and vacation schedule, which shall take precedence over the regular visitation schedule:

{holiday_schedule}

sections.title: 6. TRANSPORTATION ARRANGEMENTS
sections.content:
Transportation of the Children between the Parents' homes shall be arranged as follows:

{transportation_arrangements}

sections.title: 7. PARENTAL COMMUNICATION
sections.content:
The Parents agree to communicate regarding the Children as follows:

{communication_methods}

sections.title: 8. DECISION-MAKING AUTHORITY
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following regarding decision-making authority for the Children:

{decision_making_authority}

sections.title: 9. EDUCATION
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following regarding the Children's education:

{education_arrangements}

sections.title: 10. HEALTHCARE
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following regarding the Children's healthcare:

{healthcare_provisions}

sections.title: 11. CHILD SUPPORT
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following child support arrangements:

{child_support_terms}

sections.title: 12. RELOCATION
sections.content:
If either Parent intends to relocate their residence, the following provisions shall apply:

{relocation_provisions}

sections.title: 13. CONFLICT RESOLUTION
sections.content:
In the event of a disagreement regarding this Agreement or other issues related to the Children, the Parents agree to resolve conflicts as follows:

{conflict_resolution_method}

sections.title: 14. MODIFICATION
sections.content:
This Agreement may be modified as follows:

{modification_terms}

sections.title: 15. SPECIAL PROVISIONS
sections.content:
The Parents agree to the following additional provisions:

{special_provisions}

sections.title: 16. SIGNATURES
sections.content:
By signing below, the Parents acknowledge that they have read, understand, and agree to the terms of this Agreement, and are entering into it voluntarily, free from duress or undue influence.
